translations: 红海龟；铁球棒；（非正式）傻瓜

sentences.sentence: Green and loggerhead turtles return to this sandy beach each year to lay their eggs.
sentences.translation: 每年，绿海龟和蠵龟都会回到这里的沙滩产卵。

sentences.sentence: It has three miles of coastline with wide sandy beaches, where vacationers lounge and Loggerhead sea turtles and wood storks nest.
sentences.translation: 它拥有数英里海岸线，和宽阔的海滩，度假者酒吧、红海龟和林鹳在那里找到了安乐窝。

sentences.sentence: Every year, thousands of loggerhead sea turtles hatch on the beaches of Florida and flap desperately toward the sanctuary of the surf.
sentences.translation: 每年，上千只江海龟在佛罗里达州的海滩上孵蛋后拼命地向庇护所—-海浪匍匐前进。
